name: Mörk Drügs
description:
First and foremost, I do not endorse or promote substance abuse of any kind.

But Mörk Borg is a dark rpg setting where drug mechanics could be really helpful to add more desperation flavours. Moreover, it could give really interesting adventure opportunities. Here is my little contribution to the topic.

As I'm not a native speaker, please feel free to suggest any useful correction.
